s0242: Thirty-second year winter, Duke Wen of Jin died.
s0243: A man from Zheng sold Zheng to Qin saying: 'I control the city gates, Zheng can be attacked by surprise.'
s0244: Duke Mu asked Jian Shu and Bai Li Xi, they replied: 'Going through several states a thousand li to attack by surprise, rarely succeeds.
s0245: Moreover, this man sells Zheng, how do we know our own people haven't told Zheng our plans?'
s0247: Duke Mu said: 'You do not understand, I have already decided.'
s0248: He sent troops, had Bai Li Xi's son Meng Ming Shi, Jian Shu's son Xi Qi Shu, and Bai Yi Bing lead the troops.
s0249: On the day of departure, Bai Li Xi and Jian Shu wept for them.
s0250: Duke Mu heard and was angry, saying: 'I send troops and you cry to obstruct my army, why?'
s0251: The two elders said: 'We do not dare obstruct your army.
s0252: The army goes out and we cannot return, this is why we weep.'
s0253: When the Qin army reached Xiao, the Jin people were on guard.
s0254: The Jin army ambushed and attacked Qin, Qin was greatly defeated.
s0255: Meng Ming Shi and others were captured.
s0256: Duke Mu of Qin wore mourning clothes, personally welcomed the captives at Yong.
s0257: He restored their positions, saying: 'I did not listen to the old minister's words, and lost the army at Xiao, the fault is mine.'
s0259: Thirty-third year, attacked Jin, took Wangguan and Liyang.
s0260: Thirty-fourth year, released Meng Ming Shi and others.
s0261: Thirty-fifth year, Duke Mu died, buried at Yong.
s0263: Duke Kang of Qin first year, attacked the Quanrong.
s0283: Twenty-first year, Duke Kang died, his son Duke Gong ascended.
s0284: Duke Gong of Qin first year, attacked the Quanrong.
s0300: Seventeenth year, Duke Gong died, his son Duke Huan ascended.
